name: RoboForm Passcard File
summary: Learn about .RFP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Once a password is saved, RoboForm offers to fill it when the user revisits the same login page. RFP files are stored in an encrypted format.
Passcard files, along with other RoboForm user files, are stored in a user data folder, which can be viewed by selecting the following RoboForm menu option: RoboForm → Profiles → Explore Folder.

description: Passcard file used by RoboForm, a secure password manager and form filler application; contains online passwords that have been entered by the user; used to automatically enter passwords into online websites.
